title: Are custom announcer packs and music allowed on lol or not? Will this get me banned?
body: Ever since the bilgewater event, I wanted that gp announcer and the bilgewater music and I finally found a way... but some friends told me I should check because maybe this could get me banned or something.. so is it ok?

replies.body: They are "use at your own risk". Make sure the program you are using does not allow for cheating, as even if you dont use those features the program will get you banned. I dont have a link but there is a post stickied somewhere that has a list of safe programs.

Nope, safe. Only thing bannable is if your breaking the actual game.
You changed sound files and artwork, nothing that affects gameplay
Custom skin users same thing
sure riot not approve of it, but they're not looking for it. Since it does nothing to the actual gameplay
That's not 100% true, things like custom HP bars that highlight the last hit threshold are still banable.
